DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1, Multiple dose Study of MPC-6827 in Subjects with Refractory Brain Metastases.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study of MPC-6827 in Subjects With Refractory Brain Metastases
DOC.criteria: Refractory Brain Metastases At least 1 measurable intracranial lesion as defined by RECIST ECOG less than or equal to 1 Adequate hematology/organ function No baseline peripheral or central neuropathy above grade 1 Hypersensitivity to Cremophor EL Pregnant or Lactating Spinal Cord Compression Preexisting dementia/cognitive disfunction Require Neupogen or Neulasta to Maintain Neutrophil Count Have Primary Brain Cancer Have History of Ischemic Heart Disease Have Diabetes
